item.title: List of AI Tools & Companies
item.description: AI Tools Chat Bots Google Bard - conversational generative artificial intelligence chatbot developed by Google, based on PaLM LLM OpenAI ChatGPT - an artificial intelligence chatbot developed by OpenAI (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) OpenAI Playground - explore the capabilities of various AI models developed by OpenAI Design Flair - AI design tool for branded content Galileo AI - creates delightful, editable UI designs from a simple text description Development AskCodi - speed up the development process through tools, ask Codi AI to answer coding questions, explain code, document, or test code GitHub Copilot - cloud-based artificial intelligence tool developed by GitHub and OpenAI to assist users of Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, Neovim, and JetBrains integrated development environments by autocompleting code.
item.content:encoded:
AI Tools

Chat Bots

  • Google Bard - conversational generative artificial intelligence chatbot developed by Google, based on PaLM LLM
  • OpenAI ChatGPT - an artificial intelligence chatbot developed by OpenAI (Generative Pre-trained Transformer)
  • OpenAI Playground - explore the capabilities of various AI models developed by OpenAI

Design

  • Flair - AI design tool for branded content
  • Galileo AI - creates delightful, editable UI designs from a simple text description

Development

  • AskCodi - speed up the development process through tools, ask Codi AI to answer coding questions, explain code, document, or test code
  • GitHub Copilot - cloud-based artificial intelligence tool developed by GitHub and OpenAI to assist users of Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, Neovim, and JetBrains integrated development environments by autocompleting code.

Images

  • Adobe Firefly - mind-blowing ðŸ¤¯ generative AI tool with Generative Fill, part of Photoshop
  • Cleanup.pictures - remove unwanted object, defect, people or text from your pictures
  • DALLÂ·E 2 - creates realistic images & art from a description in natural language
  • Deep Nostalgia - animate your family photos
  • Leap - generate images, edit them, fine tune models, retrieve text context and more with best-in-class APIs and SDKs
  • Playground - create any image from your imagination

Music

  • Beatoven - create customisable royalty free music that elevates your story
  • LALAL.AI - extract vocal, accompaniment & various instruments from any audio / video
  • Soundraw - royalty-free AI generated music

Text to Speech & Voice

  • Cleanvoice - removes filler sounds, stuttering and mouth sounds from your podcast or audio recording
  • Murf - text to speech AI voice generator
  • Speechify - mobile and desktop app that reads text aloud using a computer generated text to speech voice
  • Voicemaker - online free text to speech converter

Writing

  • 10Web - AI-powered WordPress platform
  • Jasper - AI writer and AI art generator
  • Notion - organizational tools including task management, project tracking, to-do lists, bookmarking, and more
  • Ocoya - Create and schedule social media, content marketing & copywriting quicker using AI
  • Quillbot - AI-powered paraphrasing tool to enhance your writing
  • Tome - worldâ€™s first generative storytelling format to truly harness the power of artificial intelligence
  • Trinka - online grammar checker and language correction AI tool for academic and technical writing

Other

  • Brancher - connect AI models to build AI apps in minutes, with no-code
  • Decoherence - create what can’t be filmed
  • DoNotPay - the world’s first robot lawyer
  • Krisp - improves the productivity of online meetings with its AI-powered Voice Clarity and Meeting Assistant
  • Mixo - helps entrepreneurs quickly launch and validate their business ideas
  • MosaicTrack - smart recruiting solution that leverages the cognitive power of artificial intelligence to read through resumes and social profiles to find the best talent based on culture fit and skill set
  • Outfits AI - try on any outfits using AI
  • WNR - prompts made easy with AI templates

AI Companies

  • Boston Dynamics - create exceptional robots that enrich peopleâ€™s lives
  • Fast.ai - making deep learning easier to use
  • Google AI - a division of Google dedicated to artificial intelligence
  • Midjourney - independent research lab exploring new mediums of thought and expanding the imaginative powers of the human species
  • OpenAI - AI research and deployment company
  • Stability - building the foundation to activate humanity’s potential
  • Tesla AI & Robotics - developing & deploying autonomy at scale in vehicles & robots

item.title: General Links
item.description: Technology Linus Tech Tips - Consumer technology & video production TED - Talks on Technology, Entertainment & Design Podcasts Joe Rogan - The Joe Rogan Experience podcast is a long form conversation hosted by comedian Joe Rogan with friends and guests that have included comedians, actors, musicians, MMA fighters, authors, artists, and beyond Lex Fridman - Conversations about science, technology, history, philosophy and the nature of intelligence, consciousness, love, and power PBD Podcast - The PBD Podcast is hosted by Patrick Bet-David where he discusses a wide range of topics from business to current events, politics and sports Personal Blogs Nicely formatted blogs
item.content:encoded:
Technology

  • Linus Tech Tips - Consumer technology & video production
  • TED - Talks on Technology, Entertainment & Design

Podcasts

  • Joe Rogan - The Joe Rogan Experience podcast is a long form conversation hosted by comedian Joe Rogan with friends and guests that have included comedians, actors, musicians, MMA fighters, authors, artists, and beyond
  • Lex Fridman - Conversations about science, technology, history, philosophy and the nature of intelligence, consciousness, love, and power
  • PBD Podcast - The PBD Podcast is hosted by Patrick Bet-David where he discusses a wide range of topics from business to current events, politics and sports

Personal Blogs

Nicely formatted blogs

  • https://oostens.me/ - personal page / CV / blog

item.title: ETL Tools
item.description: What is ETL ? Extracting data from sources Transforming data into data models Loading data into data warehouses List of ETL Tools Ab Initio (Best of Breed) AWS Data Pipeline AWS Glue Azure Data Factory CloverDX Datastage Google Cloud Dataflow Hevo Informatica Integrate Matillion Pentaho Data Integration (PDI) Qlik Compose SAP Data Services SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) Stitch Talend
item.content:encoded:
What is ETL ?

  • Extracting data from sources
  • Transforming data into data models
  • Loading data into data warehouses

List of ETL Tools

  • Ab Initio (Best of Breed)
  • AWS Data Pipeline
  • AWS Glue
  • Azure Data Factory
  • CloverDX
  • Datastage
  • Google Cloud Dataflow
  • Hevo
  • Informatica
  • Integrate
  • Matillion
  • Pentaho Data Integration (PDI)
  • Qlik Compose
  • SAP Data Services
  • SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)
  • Stitch
  • Talend
